entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a multinational technology company known for its software products, including the Windows operating system and Office suite. The company also develops hardware products and offers various online services.

entities.name: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, N.A.
entities.description: The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. is a financial institution that provides investment services, including asset management and custodial services.

entities.name: SATYA NADELLA
entities.description: Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of Microsoft Corporation, having taken on the role in 2014. He has been instrumental in the company's shift towards cloud computing and artificial intelligence.

entities.name: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is the highest-ranking executive in a company, responsible for making major corporate decisions, managing overall operations, and acting as the main point of communication between the board of directors and corporate operations.

entities.name: CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Financial Officer (CFO) is the executive responsible for managing the financial actions of a company, including tracking cash flow, financial planning, and analyzing the company's financial strengths and weaknesses.

relationships.target_entity: THE BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, N.A.
relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft Corporation has an indemnification agreement with The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., acting as trustee.
Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of Microsoft Corporation.
The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is a key role within Microsoft Corporation.
The Chief Financial Officer (CFO) is a key role within Microsoft Corporation.
